page.title: 06TEDBURN SCHOOL-BRIEF DETAILS
page.content: There are 4 full time teachers (inc. the head) and one part time teacher (0.3). All other staff are part time . There are 106 on roll from 5 to 11 years. A crossing patrol helps children across the main road and to and from the school bus. The clerical assistant works for a short time in the mornings sorting out dinner money, registers, etc. At lunch time meals come from central kitchens in Exeter. Two kitchen assistants help serve the meals, and wash up. Two meal time assistants supervise during lunch time which lasts from 12.10 pm to 1.20 pm. Only a quarter of the children eat school meals, the rest bringing packed lunches. The school day begins at 9.05 am and finishes at 3.30 pm. We also have a cleaner-in-charge and two cleaners.
